channel.title: Mm...client help
channel.description:
OK...here goes...
Whenever I try to run my client, it gets stuck at the "Connecting to Update Server" part.
Yes, I have compiled both server and client. Yes, I have the 508 cache. Yes, I changed the IP to mine. Yes, I have the server running before the client. No, it does not work.
And yes, this has been posted many times, but I haven't found an answer yet o.o
Please help me. Thanks :)
:eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:

item.title: Mm...client help

item.description:
@qrooltex wrote:

Oops forgot to add that part to my post :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 16, 2008, 07:46:59 pm[/size][hr]help anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: Mm...client help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

The server you’re connecting to needs to be online before the client is ran. Also make sure the cache is in the correct directory.

Read full topic

item.title: Mm...client help

item.description:

OK…here goes…

Whenever I try to run my client, it gets stuck at the “Connecting to Update Server” part.

Yes, I have the server running before the client.
No, it does not work.
